problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD中,AD∥BC,对角线AC、BD相交于O,若\frac{S_{iangleADO}}{S_{iangleDOC}}=\frac{1}{3},则的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, AD ‖ BC, diagonal AC and BD intersect at O, if \\ frac {s {\triangle ADO} {s {\triangle DOC}} = \\frac {1}{3}
raw_comment: 本题考查相似三角形的判定和性质,平行线的性质等知识,解题的关键是熟练掌握基本知识,属于中考常考题型．
